name: CrossReferenceType
shortdesc: Instructional text options for cross reference.

property.name: SEE_OR_ALSO_BRACKET
property.shortdesc: Inserts 'See also' in front of the referenced topic if the topic has an associated page reference; inserts 'See' if the topic does not have a page reference.

property.name: SEE
property.shortdesc: Inserts 'See' in front of the referenced topic.

property.name: SEE_ALSO
property.shortdesc: Inserts 'See also' in front of the referenced topic.

property.name: SEE_HEREIN
property.shortdesc: Inserts 'See herein' in front of the referenced topic.

property.name: SEE_ALSO_HEREIN
property.shortdesc: Inserts 'See also herein' in front of the referenced topic.

property.name: CUSTOM_CROSS_REFERENCE
property.shortdesc: Inserts the specified string in front of the referenced topic.

property.name: CUSTOM_CROSS_REFERENCE_BEFORE
property.shortdesc: Inserts the specified string and the specified before cross reference separator in front of the referenced topic. If no before cross reference separator is specified, inserts a space.

property.name: CUSTOM_CROSS_REFERENCE_AFTER
property.shortdesc: Inserts the specified following topic separator and the specified string after the referenced topic. If no following topic separator is specified, inserts a space.
